boardgame.description: Classic bidding and bluffing game. The deck consists of sets of farm animals, 4 cards per animal. Players auction off the top animal of the deck, or try to complete their set by trading with another player. Highest bid wins, but auctioneer always has the choice to buy the animal for the same price as the highest bid._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Trading is a blind bidding system: both players place their bid face down on the table and reveal them simultaneously to each other. High bidder gets the other player's animal. Both players swap their bid. It's best to bid just a little bit more than your opponent, but just how much did he bid?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;reimplemented by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Kuhhandel Master (2009)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgameversion: Otto Maier Verlag German plastic tray edition 1985

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

played only once +++++ german edition, but game components are completely language independent anyway and you can download a rules translation from bgg ++++++++++ could be send as an uninsured letter, please ask for prices +++++ and about insured shipment...international payment : paypal OR direct bank to bank transfer (wich is cost-free inside european union by the way) OR cash (in a registered letter, exchanged into euros already) +++++ payment for germany : paypal OR personal pick up in berlin OR direct bank to bank transfer +++++ for all : no checks ! ++++++++++ international buyers beware : though german postal is relatively fast, they sadly aren´t cheap. it costs bewteen 19 - 37 euros for parcels up to a weight of 5 kg (= about 4 big boxed boardgames). price depends on where the package has to be shipped, so please ask for prices, before you hit the buy button ! +++++ insured shipment inside germany costs 8 eurosbutton ! +++++ shipment inside germany costs 8 euros

Ravenburger - Koehandel Language: Dutch _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; French Players: 3 to 5 Age: 10+ Duration: about 45 min Weight: 0.275 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: Classic bidding and bluffing game. The deck consists of sets of farm animals, 4 cards per animal. Players auction off the top animal of the deck, or try to complete their set by trading with another player. Highest bid wins, but auctioneer always has the choice to buy the animal for the same price as the highest bid. Trading is a blind bidding system: both players place their bid face down on the table and reveal them simultaneously to each other. High bidder gets the other player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s animal. Both players swap their bid. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s best to bid just a little bit more than your opponent, but just how much did he bid? See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.
